generateBlendingColors(int, int, int) - Static method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorUtil
Generates a list of colors that blend from a starting color to an ending color.
generateDialPaint(int) - Static method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorUtil
Generates and returns a single paint object, having the given color, used to draw modes in the selector dial.
generateDialPaints(int, List<Integer>) - Static method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorUtil
Generates a list of paint instances based on the mode colors (ints).
generateStartingAngles(int, float) - Static method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorUtil
Generates the starting angle for each mode on the dial of the selector.
getCurrentMode() - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Returns the mode the switch is currently in.

Returns the name of the mode at the specified index.

Returns SelectorDial.dialColors : the list of colors for the modes of the dial.
getDialColors() - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Returns the list of colors used for the modes in the dial.
